charges.charge_description: 31:5332.F-BULK CASH SMUGGLING INTO OR OUT OF THE UNITED STATES (1)

31 USC 5332-Unlawfully, knowingly and willfilly did conceal on his person or in any conveyance, article of luggage, merchandise, or other container over $10,000.00 (U.S.) in currencyor other monetary instruments, and attempt to transport or transfer such currency or monetary instruments from a place within the United States to a place outside of the United States.

31 USC 5332-Unlawfully, knowingly and willfilly did conceal on his person or in any conveyance, article of luggage, merchandise, or other container over $10,000.00 (U.S.) in currencyor other monetary instruments, and attempt to transport or transfer such currency or monetary instruments from a place within the United States to a place outside of the United States.
